General.Name: Pony Testing International Group Co
General.Description: Pony Testing Co., Ltd. provides testing services and solutions in China and internationally. It offers technical solutions, such as comprehensive testing, measurement calibration, inspection, evaluation, and factory audit. The company also provides biopharmaceutical CRO/CDMO; medical testing; medical device testing; food, agricultural products and health product testing; Carbon verification; vehicle, parts, new energy vehicles and fuel cell testing; cosmetics testing and human efficacy testing; consumer goods, textiles, toys, oil testing; environmental reliability testing; electromagnetic compatibility EMC testing; and electrical and electronic testing wait. In addition, it offers comprehensive testing in life sciences, health, and environmental protection; automobiles and consumer goods; safety and security; and electrical and electronic fields. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
